website_summaries.verdict: An affordable lip gloss that glides on as smooth as butter.
pros: True to its name, this gloss goes on as smooth as butter
Leaves lips feeling soft like a lip balm
Sits at an impressively low price point
cons: Has an initial strong scent that doesn't appeal to everyone, luckily it fades over time

customer_reviews.title: Great gloss! Got 6 of them!
customer_reviews.text: I got 6 of these guys. Super cheap and I like all of them. Maybe ‘ECLAIR doesn’t suit my skin tone but I think I can mix that one to make it work!!
customer_reviews.author: Deedra

customer_reviews.title: Stays on the lips for few minutes
customer_reviews.text: I'm so mad that I got tricked into buying this through Facebook advertising. Crapy cheap stuff. All the 5 star reviews might have gotten it for free as giveaway.
customer_reviews.author: Edita R.

customer_reviews.title: Very Natural
customer_reviews.text: I loved this color! It is so natural, which is good for my taste. I would say it goes well with just about anything! I definitely recommend this lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Norman

customer_reviews.title: Favorite lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: Favorite lip gloss! I loved NYX butter gloss already but this shade is by far my favorite. I loved it so much that I bought my best friend one so that she could have her own! My favorite things in particular: -Feels amazing on lips -Moisturizing with smooth, even distribution -Not stick -Fairly lightweight (wouldn't recommend putting on more than one coat at a time)
customer_reviews.author: Honest Heather says:

customer_reviews.title: NYX Rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: What did I do before NYX Lip Butter? This is a wonderful product. Even when the color is gone, the moisture remains. I carry it with me and reapply it throughout the day. I know this bothers some folks, but not me. My lips feel very moisturized after using it. The color is wonderful, not too light, not too bright. Just a really pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: bg1

customer_reviews.title: Apple Strudel
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss and the Apple Strudel color! Upon opening the envelope I was a bit nervous because it looked ridiculously Barbie pink. But when I put it on it was a really nice pink color, not silly looking at all. The smell is great and it's not tacky. A great price for a great gloss. I'm a big fan of NYX products.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Bristol 🧁🍷

customer_reviews.title: A good gloss for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad gloss for the price. It's a pretty smooth formula and not very sticky. It has a medium shine and a lot of color that stays around after the shine is gone. I couldn't feel it on my lips and thought it had already worn off, but when I checked in the mirror my lips were still bright pink. I wish the gloss was a bit more durable and noticeable, but I still like it enough that I might get another shade or two to keep in my purse. They have more pretty colors I'd like to try. Worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: KRJ

customer_reviews.title: Try their matte lip creme instead
customer_reviews.text: Tried this product because it was super affordable and I can’t justify spending $30 on a darn lip gloss. Didn’t love it because it was super thick and gooey. Have better luck with lip oils, chapsticks, or aquaphor for shine. However, tried another product called matte lip creme by NYX and that was PERFECT for fun colors. Try that product instead! Comes in a million shades. Put Vaseline or chapstick over for gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Vic

customer_reviews.title: Waxy feel, light color, nice shine
customer_reviews.text: It has a slightly waxy feel. Not much color, but it is okay. It keeps my lips shiny and but feels like the cheap drugstore lipgloss I used when I was younger. Now that I am older, I prefer the kind that moisturize.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Rose

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: Love this color- I usually wear it over a lip stain for longer lasting color, but it feels great going on and has a nice shine to it.
customer_reviews.author: JMurillo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss and have it in different colors. It is very moisturizing, doesn't have a smell or taste. The colors are very subtle. It lasts a long time too. Some of the colors are less expensive on Amazon too!
customer_reviews.author: d.stein

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this lipgloss. It’s not too sticky when you put your lips together. Not overly fragrant or flavorful. It does dry my lips out a little though, so put lip balm on before. Sets beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: I love you??
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a pretty color and neutral with a slight tint. I’ve worn it daily since purchasing. I’d say throughout the day I have reapplied a couple of times, but that doesn’t bother me. I wasn’t looking for something more permanent. I wouldn’t say it is super moisturizing, but it is moisturizing and certainly does not dry your lips out. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: If I could give 6 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with lip gloss and Since I bought the vanilla cream pie and apple blondie, I bought this color too....I love it. Its shiny, non sticky and its like raspberry sorbet pink, but when applied it looks starwberry ice cream pink. MAC has a similiar product in their CREAMSHEEN line.... but this is half the price and is not sticky. This is a must buy. I will definitely stock up
customer_reviews.author: Lvluvchild

customer_reviews.title: Very Sheer!
customer_reviews.text: The color is super vibrant from the outside, I was expecting the color payoff to be the same. When I applied it to my lips it was a pretty sheer red gloss. If you’re looking for a more opaque lip gloss, this isn’t it! Looks and feels great none the less.
customer_reviews.author: Kav

customer_reviews.title: Love it- when it’s the right shade
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color- looks amazing on top of my favorite shade of lipstick. And the smell is great. Makes your lips super kissable! UPDATE: Decided to buy a second tube- ordered one shade and was sent another- so beware.....
customer_reviews.author: Jen P

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX Butter Glosses and this is by far my favorite of the bunch. The smell is AMAZING- like sweet strawberries. The formula for these Butter Glosses is great- not sticky at all and very pigmented! These glosses are so affordable and wearable for daytime or night. They look great by themselves or over a lipstick. I like to use this shade by itself because it is so pigmented and glossy. It's a must if you are looking for a non-sticky bright magenta lipgloss!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I love the moi sturizing and longevity of this product, but cannot find a color the that I need. I am blonde and have fair complexion. The different colors on the blonde model look so similar and Sunday mimosa is no where near the pic. It is a light neon looking peach color. I picked because I wanted a bit of soft peach. First order was angel food cake and it was a soft mauve color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy C

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I like the Butter Gloss, they are the best price with nice colors. I rub my lips together a lot so it doesn't stay on long but I will still continue to order these.
customer_reviews.author: REGINA

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: If you cosplay and need make up on the go, this one does the job and doesn’t get sticky. Cheap and easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Wilton

customer_reviews.title: It’s nice, but
customer_reviews.text: I liked this gloss a lot, it was very moisturizing but as most glosses are, it doesn’t last more than 45 mins. This color pink is also VERY bright if you use too much, but it can be sheered out. I would not purchase this if you are sensitive to smell. It has a very pleasant scent, but because it doesn’t dry down, the smell stays just under your nose.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Newton

customer_reviews.title: Sheer red smooth
customer_reviews.text: It’s a sheer red thought it would be more pigmented but it’s ok to put over a matte red lipstick to give it more shine. Product is good
customer_reviews.author: Luck-e 🍀

customer_reviews.title: cherry red!!
customer_reviews.text: omg I L O V E this color of red!! its no to dark jut the right amount of color!! definitely will buy again😍 cherry red is the color I have on!!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Vibrant and Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Quality opaque yet shiny pigment, smooth texture and low price. It did appear brighter on my lips than I had intecipated (most tend to as I have a very fair skin tone) but once blotted it looks much more natural. It gives your lips a vibrant pinch of color which I love! Now, if I had to compare this lip gloss to another I would say it is pretty comparable to the MAC "lip glass" line, but less sticky. All and all a good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Serene4now

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very light and sheer..... love it. Just enough color for those who don’t want too much. Not sticky. Compliments my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of these lip glosses...especially coming from someone who didn’t ever wear lip stuff other than chap stick. This color is so pretty, you can put a little on for just a tint or add more to make more of a statement! Looks good on everyone!
customer_reviews.author: MFoster

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: This gloss reminds me of something you'd buy for a 7 year-old to use for dress-up. The color is pretty but it's not a class act.
customer_reviews.author: Jane K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, feel and flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This gloss is everything! Love the color,feel and flavor - lasts all day without that sticky feeling you get from other brands!
customer_reviews.author: Cami P

customer_reviews.title: Get it you’ll love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love everything about this especially how buttery soft and silk it is. Definitely a good lip gloss
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: It was very sticky and seems to feel like my lips are sticking together. It's not worth the price I paid for it. The color is BLAH!
customer_reviews.author: Leandra54

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand of lip gloss. It moisturizes my lips while giving them a little color and shine. It also smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Mac

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color
customer_reviews.text: Even though I like it... it feels tacky and comes off too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite color. Leaves my lips soft afterwards as well.
customer_reviews.author: DetectiveBiggs

customer_reviews.title: EXACTLY like color in the pictures!
customer_reviews.text: The color is just as it looks after applying it. No darker and no lighter. I love the color. I can't wear any darker colors. This is just right. If you have dark skin lips....you might not notice much of a difference in depth....They are one of my favorite brands because they always look just like the picutres & go on nicely. They stay on well if you don't eat them off.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Allen

customer_reviews.title: Too oily, does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyyyyy too oily and doesn’t last long which is a no no for me. It smells really though and I absolutely love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloss
customer_reviews.text: These butter glosses are great. They feel a little sticky at first but really moisturize the lips. The color is subtle but pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Color
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy and moisturizes well. I purchased the Apple Strudel which is a Coral/ Orange color.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyDay

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Has good staying power when used over lipstick! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Hanke

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: This brand works really well for me. Color lasts a long time if I give it about half hour to “dry” before I eat or drink anything. Doesn’t make my lips feel dry even after several hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: RED
customer_reviews.text: Shade is REALLY red, does not fade as gracefully as other shades
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Had a nice scent though
customer_reviews.text: It was really, really sticky. Compared to UD's Hi Fi Shine and Ulta's Lip Oil, this was the stickiest by far. Had a nice scent though.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light peachy shade
customer_reviews.text: Love the shade I got. I couldn't find it in any store it was always sold out. But it's the perfect peachy shade for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Covey

customer_reviews.title: Best lip gloss ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color!! And it's so soft on your lips!! Love this butter gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Not as red as I'd hoped but ok. Thought it might be a tad bit thicker. Smells ok and not sticky like some.
customer_reviews.author: STACY

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: This color is perfect for summer! Goes on smooth, not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Sung

customer_reviews.title: Compliments galore with this lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is my fave lip color and brand. Every time I wear it I get compliments and people wanting to know what it is... do yourself a favor and get you some!!
customer_reviews.author: CpggReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The best highly pigmented lip gloss around for this price! MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Great Buttery, light pink gloss!
customer_reviews.text: (from dan's gf) I ordered this on a whim and fell in LOVE. I've used it all already. it's very sheer and glossy and not as "thick" as I expected. It gives me the perfect shade of light pink without getting too crazy. It's become my new go-to everyday color. I've already ordered another. love!
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Try it
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot & you can’t go wrong with the price either
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: My current favorite
customer_reviews.text: My current favorite. Love love love NYX Butter gloss. Finding my favorite color on Amazon just made my day.
customer_reviews.author: tararemi

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go wrong using this brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lip gloss I have ever used! Stays on all day & doesn’t dry my lips like all the others brand I have used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dries out my lips
customer_reviews.text: scent and flavor are amazing, love the color but it dries out my lips pretty badly
customer_reviews.author: Chondell Swan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bargain, high quality
customer_reviews.text: Way better than expected. Stays on all day! Super moisturizing too!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Kenney

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick, the color is a little different from the one I got before at the store but it works
customer_reviews.author: juliana k.

customer_reviews.title: Love this color
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is so pretty, I love the color. I paired it with a chestnut lip liner and I got so many compliments. The formula is pretty good too, especially for the price. Not sticky and stringy.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Lipgloss cupcake
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this item damaged but overall it didnt affect the lipgloss itself. I love the texture and how comfortable and pretty it makes my lips . I would purchase again definitely
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie f.

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect to love this or the color (by judging from the picture) ...
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect to love this or the color (by judging from the picture) however this is not BRIGHT pink it is a nice, perfect pink, love this
customer_reviews.author: Littlemissssunshine

customer_reviews.title: Hint of pink
customer_reviews.text: Eh. I usually really like Nyx. The color goes on super light. It’s like a faint pink gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love all these glosses
customer_reviews.text: I love these glosses and they can’t get better for the price. I’ve been using them for years. Maple blonder has been my staple color for everyday use
customer_reviews.author: Scull Squared

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is a gloss it has a lot of pigment and leaves a cute pink hue.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Neal

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Feels light & smooth on my lips. No taste. My only complaint is it doesn't stay on long at all. Have to constantly reapply
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Lofton

customer_reviews.title: It was good, but didn't stay on my lips for long.
customer_reviews.text: I loved how it smelled and it didn't taste like chemicals and the color was absolutely beautiful and perfect and it wasn't clumpy or sticky, but it wore off quickly and it actually dry my lips when it would wear off.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Tisdale

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: All you want in a lip floss: subtle sweetness, glossy, not sticky, not runny, ideal.
customer_reviews.author: JANEENE WRIGHT

customer_reviews.title: Favorite gloss
customer_reviews.text: I love this gloss I buy it in all colors
customer_reviews.author: marebear

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I love NYX cosmetics. It's neat, available, and easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: No flavor but still great
customer_reviews.text: Product had no flavor but was very creamy and moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: It's not sticky which is good, gives a sexy but subtle look.
customer_reviews.author: Realjamaican🇯🇲🇯🇲🇯🇲

customer_reviews.title: Dark pink
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a truer red. This one has a lot of pink undertones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: like this lipgloss. very comfortable on the lips.color is very good! highly recomended
customer_reviews.author: y_molchanov

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color!! But not longwear
customer_reviews.text: I bought this color after youtuber Safiya Nygaard said it was a close duplicate for her drugstore "Franken-lipstick".
customer_reviews.author: marian Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: These are beyond gorgeous!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these sooooo much! They are so hydrating and cushiony and beautiful!! Do not hesitate to try these gems!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Oana

customer_reviews.title: beautiful gloss
customer_reviews.text: I personally loved this product, the lightest dab on my lips and they were a nice glossy red. It wears off after a little while but that's to be expected. My boyfriend did complain that it was too glossy, but what does he know ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Color does not look the same in person
customer_reviews.text: Lip gloss is not too sticky (which I dislike in other lip glosses). But- this color is not as red as it looks online. It’s more of a deep/dark magenta. I was really hoping to get a good red color.
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: Buttery and creamy lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Very buttery and creamy. Not a long lasting matte. This is moisturizing and not sticky. Very fast shipping! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Constantly REAPPLYING, NOT Longlasting
customer_reviews.text: The color was pretty and it felt good, But as soon as I took a drink, it All came Off on the glass!! I had to CONSTANTLY ReAPPLY It. Not Longlasting
customer_reviews.author: Denise E

customer_reviews.title: Wouldve never picked this color if seen in person....
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Vanilla Cream Pie gloss, So I figured I'd give this color a shot. This color is a light peachy color, with a bright peach tube. At first glance, it would be something I would pass up if seen at a store. I'm on the more tanned side and thought the color would look silly. Once applied, it looked peachy nude, not dramatic or an over powering orangish color. This is perfect if you are wear dramatic eye makeup and need a shiny non sticky gloss to polish off your look. This is a Must have :)
customer_reviews.author: Lvluvchild

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the color is exactly what I pictured it to be!
customer_reviews.author: Lady D

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is great, maybe the color was a little bit more pinky than expected but overall I love it and for the price I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Arelis

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I usually never leave reviews but since this has none I thought I would. This is my first time trying a butter lip gloss, or really anything from nyx but if you like just that little hint of color on your lips then this is the product for you, it doesn't really feel gloppy like others said in reviews for other shades/colors of this butter lip gloss. I love it and will be purchasing more colors in the near future, shipping is very quick on this product as well.
customer_reviews.author: Denice

customer_reviews.title: It does not apply well at all.
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the application of this product I dislike the color of it and I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Benson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first purchase from nyx cosmetics, and I love smell, the color & shine. But I do have one complaint: it's not long lasting but other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Nyxxie Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Color don't match
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this online, I really love the color. So I place a order, but when it come. It is pink rather than the light orange I saw on the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing.
customer_reviews.text: Moisturizing lip gloss with a nice shine. The fragrance is sometimes nauseating because it smells like a candy factory.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Great Product with Intense Color
customer_reviews.text: not too long lasting but it’s a gloss so that’s expected, i love this shade though
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss. I wish I bought another one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me. Was looking for more of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for me. Was looking for more of a gloss and this was more of a color. Sunday mimosa was the color I got.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Moisturize well.
customer_reviews.text: Light tint, perfect for no makeup days. Leaves my lips soft and supple.
customer_reviews.author: LisaB

customer_reviews.title: Like butterrrrrr.......
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I am a lip gloss fiend. This is by far my favorite! Not sticky, just smooth like butterrrrr.
customer_reviews.author: IMightReviewYou

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Such a pretty color and nice on the lips will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Skyy

customer_reviews.title: smooth, bold, creamy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! It makes me feel grown and sexy >.<
customer_reviews.author: trob

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Very very beautiful on the lips! And it helps when you have dry lips as well! Shipping was really fast!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the color! It's not sticky or dripping, would definitely would buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: sticky sticky sticky and not the right color for me
customer_reviews.text: maybe I picked the wrong color for my features, but I do not find anything unique about this lipgloss. it's mad sticky, so your hair definitely gets caught on it. it's just a typical lipgloss, nothing special. I wear red lipstick all the time, but the color I picked – cherry pie – doesnt work for me. At all. it's so sticky, which was what I was trying to avoid. Oh well, now I have extra lipgloss. i'm sure if it was a better color for me, I would be more impressed. So please don't let my experience stop you
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best lip gloss I've ever purchased. the color is spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Maple blondie
customer_reviews.text: Best lip gloss. Maple blondie is the perfect peachy pink color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: I liked the smell of it and how it made my lips feel very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.author: alyssa durant

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this gloss
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gloss. It's my go to lip butter. I especially like how it look different on various skin tones plus it pair great with any pink or nude lipstick
customer_reviews.author: Panther7

customer_reviews.title: butter lips 2
customer_reviews.text: did my research got the color that compliments me...luv how smooth it goes on and best of all its no sticky feeling! i feel that with this product IF you do have a sticky feeling your applying it too thick...you really only need one application...totally worth the money which i will be buying more..also it helps to youtube the product so you can see the exact colors which is what i did
customer_reviews.author: Genya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, Thick, and pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, highly pigmented and thick. I thought the color was more of a deep fuchsia or even closer to burgundy but the Cherry Pie is literally red. I suppose that makes sense, cherry's are red...I guess I was put off by the pic. Overall a good product. I couldn't tell you if it is long lasting because as soon as I saw the color on my lips I gave it away...
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Very light shade- not for all skin tones
customer_reviews.text: It smells fantastic and it feels great on the lips. However it is super light on light to medium skinned girls. It’s kind of a weird shade to pull off, not sure how else to describe it but light. This can be fixed though. Instead of swiping it across the lips, dot it 3-4 times on the bottom lip, rub your lips together, and blend with your finger. You still get the gloss, scent, and a nice peachy pink shade that doesn’t look too washed out. That’s the word, washed out. The NYX butter glosses are great, I recommend for either super light or super dark skin shades.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

product_meta.title: NYX PROFESSIONAL MAKEUP Butter Gloss, Maple Blondie, 0.27 Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:Maple BlondieButtery soft and silky smooth, our decadent Butter Gloss is now available in 12 more sumptuous shades! Each glossy color delivers sheer to medium coverage that melts onto your lips and is never sticky, leaving your lips soft, supple and kissable.
feature_bullets: BUTTER GLOSS: Buttery soft & silky smooth, our decadent Butter Gloss is available in a wide variety of sumptuous shades! Each glossy color delivers sheer to medium coverage that melts onto your lips
KISSABLE LIPS: Our best-selling Butter Gloss goes on smooth & creamy & is never sticky, leaving your lips soft, supple & kissable. Try all of our delicious shades, from Angel Food Cake to Tiramisu!
LIP PRODUCTS FOR THE PERFECT POUT: Doll your lips in plush, creamy, perfection! Try our complete line of lip products including lipstick, lip liner, lip gloss, lip cream, lip liner, & butter gloss
CRUELTY FREE COSMETICS: We believe animals belong in our arms—not in a lab. All of our makeup is certified & acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We don't test any of our products on animals
DISCOVER NYX COSMETICS: Try all of our Professional Makeup & beauty products today, from eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara & false lashes to lipstick, foundation, primer, blush, bronzer, brushes & more!
